title: Add Intro landing page (Intro → Home) using provided banner image

requirements.text: Create a new Intro page that uses the uploaded image "brotherhood of copper banner-1.png" as the primary intro visual and provides a clear call-to-action that navigates the user from Intro to the Home page.

quotes: create a intro page and link the the pages by the following  Intro to Home and use this photo as the intro

acceptanceCriteria: A new React page component exists for the Intro page (e.g., IntroPage) and renders the uploaded image prominently (e.g., as a full-bleed background/hero image or centered banner).
Intro page includes at least one obvious control (button/link) labeled in English (e.g., "Enter", "Continue", or "Go to Home") that navigates to the Home page route.
The image renders correctly in production as a static frontend asset (not fetched from the backend).

requirements.text: Update routing so the application opens on the Intro page and the Home page is accessible via a dedicated route, ensuring navigation flows Intro → Home without breaking existing routes (/ranks, /divisions, /lore, /history, /photo, /posters).
acceptanceCriteria: The Home page is reachable via a stable route (e.g., "/home") and renders the existing HomePage content.
All previously existing routes continue to work as before (/ranks, /divisions, /lore, /history, /photo, /posters).
All internal links that previously pointed to "/" for Home are updated to point to the new Home route where appropriate.

requirements.text: Adjust the site navigation behavior to account for the new Intro page so users can still reach Home easily and the Intro page is not mistakenly labeled as Home.

quotes: create a intro page and link the the pages

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation includes a "Home" link that routes to the Home page route (not the Intro route).
The Intro route is either not shown in the primary nav, or is clearly labeled as "Intro" if included.
The active-link highlighting works correctly for the Home route and other routes after the routing change.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only components).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrapping files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
nonGoals: Adding new backend canister methods or persistence.
Adding authentication changes or Internet Identity flow changes.
Adding poster detail views or other new poster features beyond Intro → Home navigation.
